about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Bryan Grandon - Junior Frontend Developer
paragraph: Hi! I’m a Junior Frontend Developer who enjoys crafting modern, intuitive, and visually engaging web interfaces. I love transforming ideas into smooth and responsive digital experiences, always paying attention to detail, usability, and performance.

I’m constantly learning and exploring new technologies because the web never stops evolving — and neither do I. Every project is an opportunity to grow, innovate, and deliver something better than yesterday.
I believe in clean code, creative solutions, and the power of great user experience. I’m excited to contribute, collaborate, and keep building products that people enjoy using.
